amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes technical and clarifying changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in House Report 114-136 to make technical and clarifying changes to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
